picks.text: Federico finds a use for Thunderbolt 5
picks.full-pick-text: Federico finds a use for Thunderbolt 5

picks.text: Federico drills a hole in wall for running a cable to an external GPU
picks.full-pick-text: Federico drills a hole in wall for running a cable to an external GPU

picks.text: Ticci tries an e-ink phone to help reduce distractions and get more into reading
picks.full-pick-text: Ticci tries an e-ink phone to help reduce distractions and get more into reading
picks.notes:
• After writing down the pick but before the episode was recorded, Federico mused about this on Threads, but the other hosts will allow it. And he might already have one that he doesn't use already. The key is that Federico needs to actually speak about it.
  • Federico did indeed try an e-ink phone and discussed it on the Pro show of Connected 513.

picks.text: Another Windows handheld is declared to be "the best", resulting in Ticci selling his Legion Go
picks.full-pick-text: Another Windows handheld is declared to be "the best", resulting in Ticci selling his Legion Go
picks.notes: • With no rules against half-points, the fact that Federico has kept but repurposed his Legion Go as a SteamOS device and no longer considers it "the best" gets partial credit.

picks.text: Federico speaks before a government body in an official capacity about AI training
picks.full-pick-text: Federico speaks before a government body in an official capacity about AI training

picks.text: Viticci adds a water feature to his balcony
picks.full-pick-text: Viticci adds a water feature to his balcony

picks.text: Federico re-explores the world of glasses that serve as an external display
picks.full-pick-text: Federico re-explores the world of glasses that serve as an external display

picks.text: Federico makes more than 10 Flexie picks in one game of the Rickies
picks.full-pick-text: Federico makes more than 10 Flexie picks in one game of the Rickies
picks.notes: • This didn't take long.

picks.text: Ticci builds something new with magnets
picks.full-pick-text: Ticci builds something new with magnets

picks.text: Ticci finally breaks down and admits his friends were right and buys an Ayn Odin 2
picks.full-pick-text: Ticci finally breaks down and admits his friends were right and buys an Ayn Odin 2
picks.notes: • OTJ gives a lesson on Ticci Psychology in explaining why this has not already happened.

picks.text: Ticci returns to WWDC and tries a new food. He doesn't like it
picks.full-pick-text: Ticci returns to WWDC and tries a new food. He doesn't like it
picks.notes:
• OTJ further predicts being pressed into service as Federico's food taster after some events of the previous year.
  • It was even captured on video.

picks.text: Federico creates another Frankenstein computer device
picks.full-pick-text: Federico creates another Frankenstein computer device
picks.notes: • Federico initially thinks not, but a "crazy eGPU that at some point caught on fire" definitely counts.

picks.text: Federico discovers a new kickstand technology
picks.full-pick-text: Federico discovers a new kickstand technology
picks.notes: • Initially graded as incorrect, a week later it was revealed that Federico has been enjoying a MagSafe wallet that features a kickstand, granting Myke some retroactive passion points.

picks.text: He gets a new technology-related tattoo
picks.full-pick-text: He gets a new technology-related tattoo

picks.text: Federico considers implanting a magnet and/or NFC chip into his body
picks.full-pick-text: Federico considers implanting a magnet and/or NFC chip into his body
